title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5306.1 - Persons required to register as a non-gaming employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5306.1 - Persons required to register as a non-gaming employee

State Regulations
A person, as defined in section
5300.1
of this Title, is required
to obtain a non-gaming employee registration prior to being involved in any
non-gaming activities at a gaming facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5306.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
